com.jdroid.android.fragment
Class AbstractLocalSearchFragment<T>

java.lang.Object
  android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      android.support.v4.app.ListFragment
          com.jdroid.android.fragment.AbstractListFragment<T>
              com.jdroid.android.fragment.AbstractLocalSearchFragment<T>
Type Parameters:
T - An item in the list. The filtering will be done based on T#toString().
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemClickListener, ComponentIf, FragmentIf, OnItemSelectedListener<T>, DefaultUseCaseListener
public abstract class AbstractLocalSearchFragment<T>
extends AbstractListFragment<T>

Search fragment that performs the search only once, when the fragment is created, and has the ability to filter thereafter.

Author:
Estefania Caravatti
